"About Special Ability Factors":
"Some NT weapons or units will have a \"Special Ability Factor\" when their grind level reaches their maximum level.

These Special Ability Factors are unique Special Abilities that you can select when you add \"Special Abilities\"."

"You can preview what type of Special Ability Factor your weapons or units might have by using the \"Special Ability Factor Confirmation\" option.

â€»Special Ability Factors are not bound to the same type of restrictions that most regular Special Abilities face."
